meaning_str.bing:
n. 野外；旷野；郊外
adv. 在户外；在野外
网络. 户外活动；室外；户外运动

户外活动；室外；户外运动

在户外；在室外；在野外；在露天
户外；室外；露天；野外；旷野；郊外；自然环境

1.en: The method can take a rest eyes closed, doing eye exercises, or to walk outdoors, etc. , which will help to eliminate eye strain.
1.cn: 休息的方法可采取闭目养神，做眼保健操，或到室外走动等，这样有利于消除视觉疲劳。

2.en: The only person left outdoors was a teenage boy who was lying flat on his back in a flowerbed outside number four.
2.cn: 只有一个14、5岁的小孩子留在了外面，他躺在女贞路四号花台的外面。

3.en: i fell in love with the outdoors and i remember going into the local sporting goods store , which is not uncommon to see.
3.cn: 我很喜欢密西根州，我爱上了那里的户外环境。记得我到当地的体育用品商店，当时这种店并不普遍。

0.en: I didn't really hit my academic stride until I cut out that timesuck known as "playing outdoors."
0.cn: 我真正在学术理论上取得进步是在我取消了浪费时间的"户外游玩"之后。

1.en: I believe any man who take such pride in his natural naked state, will surely enjoy the brisk of the outdoors.
1.cn: 我相信任何为自己自然裸露而如此骄傲的男人。肯定会享受户外的清爽。

2.en: It's great to be outdoors. We should run around a bit and get some exercise. I want to eat, then have a nap. I certainly don't want to run around.
2.cn: 出来玩真开心呐，我们应该稍微跑一下，做些锻炼。我想吃点东西，再睡一会。我可不想再跑来跑去了。

3.en: It's great to be outdoors. We should run around a bit and get some exercise. I want to eat, then have a nap. I certainly don't want to run around.
3.cn: 出来玩真开心呐，我们应该稍微跑一下，做些锻炼。我想吃点东西，再睡一会。我可不想再跑来跑去了。

4.en: Okay, while Cory and Topanga are checking us in, let me welcome you all to Mount Sun Lodge, where we are here to turn our thoughts away from our indoor relationships and towards our relationships with the outdoors.
4.cn: 好了，现在科瑞和托庞嘉在帮我们办理入住手续，我在此欢迎你们来到太阳山滑雪旅馆，在这里可以让我们的思绪，远离那些私密关系，让我们之间的关系显露在外吧。
